MS.S: This module provides compatibility utilities that allow PowerShell Core sessions to_x000D__x000A_invoke commands that are only available in Windows PowerShell. These utilities help you_x000D__x000A_to discover available modules, import those modules through proxies and then use the module_x000D__x000A_commands much as if they were native to PowerShell Core.

This module provides a set of commands that allow you to use_x000D__x000A_Windows PowerShell modules from PowerShell Core (PowerShell 6)._x000D__x000A_The following commands are included: _x000D__x000A_ Initialize-WinSession_x000D__x000A_ Add-WinFunction_x000D__x000A_ Invoke-WinCommand_x000D__x000A_ Get-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Import-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Compare-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Copy-WinModule_x000D__x000A_See the help for the individual commands for examples on how_x000D__x000A_to use this functionality._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Additionally, the command `Add-WindowsPSModulePath` will update_x000D__x000A_your $ENV:PSModulePath to include Windows PowerShell module directories_x000D__x000A_within PowerShell Core 6._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_NOTE: This release is only intended to be used with PowerShell Core 6_x000D__x000A_running on Microsoft Windows. Linux and MacOS are not supported at this_x000D__x000A_time.
Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved

This module provides compatibility utilities that allow PowerShell Core sessions to_x000D__x000A_invoke commands that are only available in Windows PowerShell. These utilities help you_x000D__x000A_to discover available modules, import those modules through proxies and then use the module_x000D__x000A_commands much as if they were native to PowerShell Core.

This module provides a set of commands that allow you to use_x000D__x000A_Windows PowerShell modules from PowerShell Core (PowerShell 6)._x000D__x000A_The following commands are included: _x000D__x000A_ Initialize-WinSession_x000D__x000A_ Add-WinFunction_x000D__x000A_ Invoke-WinCommand_x000D__x000A_ Get-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Import-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Compare-WinModule_x000D__x000A_ Copy-WinModule_x000D__x000A_See the help for the individual commands for examples on how_x000D__x000A_to use this functionality._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Additionally, the command `Add-WindowsPSModulePath` will update_x000D__x000A_your $ENV:PSModulePath to include Windows PowerShell module directories_x000D__x000A_within PowerShell Core 6._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_NOTE: This release is only intended to be used with PowerShell Core 6_x000D__x000A_running on Microsoft Windows. Linux and MacOS are not supported at this_x000D__x000A_time.
